Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low around 75F PERIOD Winds ENE at  to  mph PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Inclement weather pushed the start time of the University of Hawaii at Mnoa football teams game against No PERIOD  Michigan Saturday night back an hour but the latest start time at Michigan Stadium in Wolverines history didnt affect their offense as they thrashed the Rainbow Warriors  PERIOD

Michigan  scored on its second play from scrimmage in the opening quarter when J.J PERIOD McCarthy found Saint Louis Schools graduate Roman Wilson for a 42yard touchdown catch PERIOD Wilson also had a 21yard rushing touchdown in the first quarter after getting the ball on an endaround play PERIOD

Tylan Hines had the lone touchdown of the night for the Rainbow Warriors  with a 55yard touchdown at the  mark of the fourth quarter as Hawaii punted on its first eight possessions of the game PERIOD

Joey Yellen was the first quarterback this season to play all four quarters as the starting gunslinger for the Rainbow Warriors but the Pitt transfer struggled in the pocket only completing  of his  pass attempts for  yards PERIOD

Hawaii also recorded its first two sacks of the season in the loss Saturday as defensive tackles Blessman Taala and John Tuitupou each recorded a sack on Michigans Cade McNamara during the game PERIOD Linebacker Penei Pavihi led the team in tackles with six PERIOD

The Rainbow Warriors are back to play FCS opponent Duquesne at the Clarence T PERIOD C PERIOD Ching Complex Saturday at  p.m PERIOD HST PERIOD Spectrum Sports payperview will have the television broadcast and ESPN Honolulu will have the radio broadcast PERIOD
